channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Want to skip Thanksgiving? 11 reasons to escape to Europe instead
item.description: Skip Thanksgiving this year and explore Europe, which is more affordable and less crowded this time of year.

item.title: No Real ID or passport? The TSA may charge you $18 to go through security
item.description: The Transportation Security Administration is planning to charge travelers $18 when they don't bring a Real ID or acceptable ID alternative to the air...

item.title: United axes Stockholm and Dakar from route map
item.description: United Airlines confirmed this week that it will end service from Washington, D.C., to Dakar, Senegal, and from Newark to Stockholm.

item.title: Frontier Airlines adds 4 routes, eyes inflight Wi-Fi for its planes
item.description: Frontier Airlines announced a four-route expansion while revealing it's exploring inflight Wi-Fi for its planes.

item.title: On board Swiss' luxe Airbus A350 with its new Swiss Senses cabins
item.description: Swiss introduces its first Airbus A350 with its tip-to-tail refreshed onboard product.
